label: CityGo
title: CityGo Travel Booking app
description: The app addresses the common challenges travelers encounter when planning city tours, such as cumbersome booking processes and unclear navigation. By providing a streamlined user experience, the app ensures secure user management and simplifies the booking journey. With CityGo, travelers can easily discover and book their ideal city tours, making their travel planning efficient and enjoyable.

featuresCompleted.name: User Authentication
featuresCompleted.description: JWT-based authentication for user access using Node.js and Express.

featuresCompleted.name: Shopping Cart Management
featuresCompleted.description: Easily review and manage selected tours with Redux for state management.

featuresCompleted.name: Tour Filtering
featuresCompleted.description: Filter tours by location, duration, and price using React Hooks for state handling.

featuresCompleted.name: Quick Tour Search
featuresCompleted.description: Find specific tours with keyword search powered by Elasticsearch.

featuresCompleted.name: Booking Process
featuresCompleted.description: Guided booking for dates and group sizes implemented with React Router.

featuresCompleted.name: Interactive Availability Calendar
featuresCompleted.description: Visual calendar for selecting available dates using a custom React component.

featuresCompleted.name: Responsive Design
featuresCompleted.description: User-friendly on mobile and desktop devices, developed with CSS Grid and Flexbox.

featuresCompleted.name: Database Integration
featuresCompleted.description: Efficient storage and retrieval of user data using PostgreSQL with Knex.js.

featuresCompleted.name: Interactive Tour Map
featuresCompleted.description: Visualize tour locations on an lightweight interactive map using Leaflet Maps API.

nextSteps: As I continue to enhance the CityGo Travel Booking app, my focus is on implementing features that improve user experience. I appreciate your feedback as I work towards delivering a seamless booking process and expanded functionalities.

featuresInProgress.name: User Comments
featuresInProgress.description: Allow users to leave feedback and reviews.

featuresInProgress.name: Enhanced Map Functionality
featuresInProgress.description: Improved map features for better navigation.

outcome: The CityGo app is live and ready for exploration! Check out the demo to see the features in action, and feel free to visit the GitHub repository for collaboration or to share your feedback.
